\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	I \&\&\&\& {\mathcal C} \& F \\
	\&\&\&\&\&\& R \\
	\&\& J \&\&\& \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "F", from=1-1, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\varphi }"', from=1-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\gamma }", Rightarrow, from=1-6, to=2-7]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\alpha }"', color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, Rightarrow, from=1-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow[""{name=2, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\varphi _! F}"{pos=0.2}, color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, curve={height=-12pt}, from=3-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow[""{name=3, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "R"', curve={height=12pt}, from=3-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["\theta"', Rightarrow, dashed, from=3-6, to=2-7]
	\arrow["\alpha", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, shorten <=5pt, shorten >=5pt, Rightarrow, from=0, to=2]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=1, to=2-7]
	\arrow["\theta", shorten <=4pt, shorten >=4pt, Rightarrow, dashed, from=2, to=3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
